topic.prompt: If you could add one nonsensical rule to everyday life, what would it be?

messages.text: whenever you go to school you roll a roulette and see how much sleep you get for that day
I could imagine some days being super productive and others being really tough to get through.
what if u had a test
I would probably study for hours the night before because I really don’t want to be at a disadvantage because of the roulette
i wouldnt cuz ill skip if i roll low
don’t know if I could do that
I have commitments to fulfill and I don't want to let anyone down

reason: Messages don't sound like how [REDACTED] talks, Messages don't match realistic knowledge
